content.detailedDescription: at 11:14 pm we shut off the lights to go to bed and my husband noticed a blinking light in the southeast sky that was hovering. we watched it for a few minutes and then i got up to get a better look.  it is fairly high up and appears round with fast moving red and green lights that resemble an arrow shape and move in the same pattern repeatedly.  as of 12:42 am it is still there.
content.summary: Noticed blinking object in sky @ 23:14. as of 1.5 hrs later still hovering w.Triangle shaped lights in pattern.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from my in-laws house who live in the greens creek area between stephenville and dublin but more near dublin with my four year old and 12 week old in the car with me.  it was not long after i turned off of county road 242 which i had been heading north, on to another county road, i believe it is county road 381 heading south east.  it was not long after i turned onto county road 381 that i noticed two bright lights in the sky.  out of the view from my windshield the light to my left was slightly higher.  my initial reaction was that they were planets, they were orangish in color and they were larger than star.  i slowed down and leaned forward in my seat to investigate what i was seeing.  i soon realize they were far too large to be planets almost as soon as i came to this realization another light appeared above and to the left of the light on my right and then another light appeared above the new light and to its left forming a straight line at about a 45-60 degree angle.  the lights were stationary in the sky never moving. as the new lights appeared i started freaking out.  as you well know ufo sightings are prevelant in our area and i could not believe that i could be possilby witnessing it for myself. probalby second after the new lights appeared they faded beginning with the first light on my left and then they were all completly gone.  once the lights on the left started to show up i did not pay as much attention to the light on the far right.  i do not believe it changed but do not recall when for sure it faded although i know it was within seconds of the other lights.  in all the event took place in probably less than 2 minutes.  the thought of the ufo sightings did not occured to me as the third and fourth light appeared but it was really the manner that the lights faded that convienced me that i had just witnessed something strange.  i was very excited and shocked about what i had just seen and got on the phone to share it with my husband immediatly.  my outgoing call to him was at 7:44 p.M.   therefore i approximate the sighting took place at 7:42 p.M.
i just recieved word via facebook that a friend of mine also witnessed lights in the sky this evening although i do not know the specifics of their sighting.
content.summary: Saw bright lights in sky that caught my attention.

content.detailedDescription: Four friends and i were sitting on the beach in a sort of enclave next to a cliff watching a very beautiful sunset.  as we looked out at the sun dipping below the horizon we all noticed what looked like to be an ordinary plane from a distance.  we thought that because the way it was flying steady and linear, but what kept my interest was how low the reddish orange glowing object was flying. it wasn't very big it was about pea sized from my perspective. it maintained it's path and we all could hear no audible noise.  my friends didn't take it seriously as a "unidentified flying object" at first until they realized that if it was a plane we would have heard it from since it was so close.  it was difficult to judge how close the object was and plus i'm bad at estimating measurements.  it was about 350-400 yards away, about 200-300 feet above the treeline.  it was traveling at about 25-30 miles and hour and it traveled from west to east and it went out of our sight over the hills.  so once my friend ray could no longer deny it being a ufo he pulled out his cellphone and took a video of it.  since i have filed this report i have not been able to get a hold of ray through his phone(probably didn't pay his bill) so i'll have to go visit him personally to try to retrieve the cell phone footage.
content.summary: Saw low flying red orb on a lost coast beach near the border of mendocino and humboldt.

content.detailedDescription:
We decided to drive to eureka springs ar via back country roads to observe the fall foilage.  we traveled east from rogers ar on highway 12 into madison county then took highway 23 north into eureka springs ar.
enroute to eureka and on the return trip my wife snapped several pictures of the clouds as it was a partly cloudy day.
 
upon returning home we downloaded the digital photos to our computer and it was then we noticed the object in the sky. using photo processing software i cut the area out containing the object and made a second photo and tried to enhance it with the software.  the enhanced photo contains an enlargement of the object that is pasted into the lower right corner.

i am including with this report both the original and enhanced photos.

sincerely,

lonnie halcumb
content.summary: Light blueish dish with what appeared to be a dome on top of disk.

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 19:33 2 miles west of santo tx, i was in the process of feeding my dogs when i noticed out of the corner of eye a bright light. i stopped to look and the bright light began to dim, then immediately a second light illuminated for one second, then a third for one second and then a fourth. after the fourth illumination, i saw 4 tiny white dots moving very slowly across the sky and within a second or two all the lights disappeared. they reappeared in almost the same area, in the same pattern and it happened again for a total of 3 cycles. they were approximately 200ft agl, 2 miles from our home. the colors were a yellowish orange that seem to change colors and almost flicker
content.summary: The colors were a yellowish orange that seem to change colors and almost flicker

content.detailedDescription: Reviewing pictures i'd taken of a beautiful evening sunset, in one i notice a white translucent sphere, or orb, in the sky. i could have an internal structure, but nothing definitive, perhaps in the eye of the beholder. it's not the moon, the moon was out but in a different part of the sky in other pictures i took of that portion of the sunset sky.
content.summary: Translucent white orb in air in sunset photo in st. louis

content.detailedDescription: I looked out the window to see if i see anything and i catch an array of strange orbs or ufos flying about.. i guess they are putting on a nice colorful show because of the sighting i had earlier in the day that scared the living crap out of me.. i told "them" i would not record them anymore and that, they can't come in the form of "blackchoppeprs" because it is too scary especially when flying low. they decided to come in the form of orbs and entertain, i guess to apologize for the scare..  look and enjoy.. this is over nyc, central park and mid-town area.... began around 7:40pm until 9pm. then it was completely quite the entire night..  111709 v456
content.summary: Orbs/ufos put on a light show over nyc 111709.

content.detailedDescription: I am 26 years old and have never seen anything in the sky like this before. i was completely sober, with no drugs or alcohol in my system at all. i seek no fame from this event, the only thing i ask is to please be told if anyone else reports anything similar to this event around my area, so i know i'm not crazy. i was on my way home from work (i ride bicycle), and i happened to glance to the left and in the sky i saw 3 bright orange lights appear. it's hard to explain. one second they weren't there, and the next, they were. large and round in shape, they appeared all at once in the sky and lasted for roughly 3-5 seconds before disappearing, one at a time. i stopped my bike and thought that it must have been fireworks or something. and then, about 3 minutes later, it happened again. bright round orange lights, appearing in a semi-circle pattern in the sky. after 4 seconds or so they disappear, always one dimming then the next, and finally the last. i then took my cell phone out and the next time they appeared, roughly 4 minutes later, i took a video clip. i caught the tail end of their act, only about a second worth of footage. but you can clearly see something there, and then fading out. they appeared about 4 times at the location where i was at, then i got on my bike and continued home. after riding no more than 3 or 4 minutes i saw them again, this time at a different spot in the sky. that is when i knew this was no balloon or fireworks or something. this was something else. i am completely shaken, right down to my core, about everything i have learned about science and whether we are alone in the universe. i swear on my sons life, this is not an attention seeking email. i just want to know that what i saw was real. please, just let me know if this sounds crazy to you. thank you for taking the time to read my letter.
content.summary: The ufo that i saw was shaped like a semi-circle. 3 bright orange lights.

content.detailedDescription:
It was the day of the leonid meteor shower. i was out with my wife in the middle of a playground around 4-5 am star gazing and watching out for meteors. there were other star gazers too. 
i was looking at a particular star formation/constellation when i noticed one of the 'stars' moving. it was really far off, like a dim star, so it was difficult to point out to my wife. it kept moving in a straight line from west to east across the sky. i was excited because i thought it was a ufo! my wife completely believes in ufos but she reasoned that it might have been a satellite as they are sometimes visible to the naked eye. i was somewhat convinced. 
however, after a while i noticed another 'star' moving in a similar fashion, this time from south to north. now this one was not moving in a straight line, it was moving in a somewhat zigzag and erratic motion but generally from south to north. now this could not be a satellite as it wasn't moving straight. the distance was too great to have been a plane and why would a plane or satellite move in a zigzag pattern? after sometime it faded away and i lost sight of it. 
though we would love to see a real ufo up close, i really hope what i saw was a ufo!
content.summary: Small dot extremely far off but motion was zigzag unlike any aircraft

content.detailedDescription: Driving down the highway 37, 1 mile south from intersection 37 and hwy 50 intersection, with the family off to east of  the road at 7:14pm, we saw large lights close to ground. we could not tell how far away lights were. everyone in the vehicle noticed because we had similar event last year in same general area. the large lights started to ascend into air while they would be vivid orange and then pitch black. it looked like it was almost generating energy during black stage because when lights would appear again it looked somewhat glitched, then lights spun around which looked like a half circle to boomerang shape and became more vivid. the lights them self looked like as if looking into a conical shape of a flashlight. it went very fast into a westward position and went black and gone. next we looked up trying to find it and it was gone but 5 planes/jets were in the area above it. we have always watched the sky in this area, because last while coming home in same area  on january 28 and 8:40pm, we {all 5 people in my family} were driving west to get to hwy 37 when i looked up to the west in the sky and said "oh my god look its a ufo." my kids began to panic and scream and my husband freaked out after seeing it. i wanted to stop and watch because i was excited, but my family was screaming and trying to rip themselves out of the car. at this time the object was moving in a west to eastward position. it was very large it started with 3 large orange lights, then went black & seemed to hover and then fanned out into about 9-12 lights. it was as well, boomerang to half-circle shape moving at a good speed after it was done hovering.  we kept driving because my family was freaking out. we watched that for about 2-3 minutes as well. so from this event last year to this event yesterday my family tends to always watch the sky in this area.
content.summary: Large orange lights looked like they were conical on a half circle.

content.detailedDescription: On november 18, 2009 @ 1:19 am; saw a flying object to the east of the home hovering over a horse pasture after hearing some noises.  object was observed for a short time before i contacted my roommate who is a dispatcher for the local sheriff's office.  officer was dispatched to the location.  as officer was en route, the craft continued to hover over the pasture area, occasionally coming towards the house and exhibiting erratic/quick movements.  size/shape of the object is unknown but has multiple lights on the top/sides/bottom of craft.  shortly before the officer arrived on scene, the craft approached the house again and the dogs became excited and started to bark continuously. (can be heard on recored phone call) as the officer was arriving on scene, the craft took of quickly heading straight up flashing red/blue.  the night was cold (32*) with low humidity and no moon providing very clear visibility with lots of stars.  upon checking, a similar complaint was filed in july of 2008 in the same area.
content.summary: Flying object approached house/ multi color lights/ no sound

content.detailedDescription: On november 18, 2009 @ 1:19 am; saw a flying object to the east of the home hovering over a horse pasture after hearing some noises.  object was observed for a short time before i contacted my roommate who is a dispatcher for the local sheriff's office.  officer was dispatched to the location.  as officer was en route, the craft continued to hover over the pasture area, occasionally coming towards the house and exhibiting erratic/quick movements.  size/shape of the object is unknown but has multiple lights on the top/sides/bottom of craft.  shortly before the officer arrived on scene, the craft approached the house again and the dogs became excited and started to bark continuously. (can be heard on recored phone call) as the officer was arriving on scene, the craft took of quickly heading straight up flashing red/blue.  the night was cold (32*) with low humidity and no moon providing very clear visibility with lots of stars.  upon checking, a similar complaint was filed in july of 2008 in the same area.
content.summary: Flying object approached house/ multi color lights/ no sound

content.detailedDescription:
I was living in bayamon puerto rico at the time, in a place called urbanizacion san fernando. i was a child then, about 6 or 7 years old at the time, i was in the living room when at about 8:20 pm my parents and i noticed some commotion out in the street. we ran out side and i saw all the neighbors on the street pointing up at the night sky towards the end of the cul-de-sac, about 700 feet away. i look up and see very clearly, an huge craft with rows of lights blinking in sequence, white, blue, some green. it wasn���t very high above the houses,  probably about the height of a 15 story building. the craft was probably about 500 hundred meters wide may be more! i coudn't believe my eyes, this gigantic machine was just floating in the air shining it's lights, i waited for my fahter to say something like "oh that's just a blimp with lights" or something like it but he just stood there with his mouth open. 

it was a big craft hovering, no sound, and everyone who was out on the street could see it. this wasn���t some bright light in the sky moving behind trees, this was something you could see very clearly, no clouds in between it and us, very close and you could see the fuselage or metal that it was made of because of the reflection of it���s flashing lights on it. the craft wasn't completely flat, it's shape was part concave and part convex, as when you take a piece of paper hold it infront of you and pull the top part towards your face, this curvature is what reflected light illuminating the craft's body. it had a wide row of lights aroun it's outer edge or diameter and then a shorter row of lights above that and another set of lights below the wider row. some other lights blinked very fast others slower. yes, it was that close that all of us could actually see it's structure, so it wasn't just some set of lights hanging on some wires or some balloon or blimp flying by.     

i remember very clearly because at the time i had no preconception of what ufo���s were so i looked at it with a clean slate, not thinking it was ���this or that��� , i just observed and took in every little detail. we stood there for a about ten or 15 minutes and some people where saying that this thing had been there for a while now. my parents grabbed me and ran back into our home in fear. they closed all the windows and kept asking each other ���what is that?��� i���ve never seen my parents as scared as they were that night. you could feel the fear or anxiety of everyone who was witnessing the event. 

after witnessing this event, which must have been seen by thousands that night, i don't know what all the fuss is about the phoenix lights. 
it's a pitty that in the 70's camcorders weren't available like they are today because this ufo i saw that night would have been the most undeniable proof of intelligent life visiting earth because of how close it was to the ground, how clearly you could see it's fuselage and all the lights in it, and how it looked like something with mass and not just some massless row of bright lights blinking on an off.
content.summary: Gigantic disc with dome, flashing lights white, blue, green.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home and pulled up to my street. i have a nice sky view to the left and noticed how clear a night it was. saw a very, very bright star. i assumed it was a star but knew it was too low and bright. this was at around 7:45 pm eastern standard time. i went into my house and grabbed a pair of binoculars. told my wife and she too thought it was bright for a star. binoculars were not that powerful but i could see it was a continuous bright white light with a touch of red on the bottom. it was a contant brightness, nothing like a star or plane light. i came back out about 40 minutes later and i noticed it moved, not far at all but enough to prove it  was not a stationary object. then i watched many planes fly by the object. it certainly was no plane, star, meteor(although last night there was a meteor shower)at that point i continued to watch and called my brother since i knew he would have a good view where he lives, about 3 miles from me. we both watched it for about an hour and it definately drifted farther into the sky but still incredibly bright. we watched many airplanes fly by it. i drove to his house and watched it as much as i could incase it disappeared. watched it together from his rear yard which is much higher area than my house. we had an incredible view. at about 10:00 pm we decided to drive to a local store and purchase a telescope with hopes of getting a close up view. we didn't want to leave. as we drove towards the store area, we noticed it disappeared around 10:30. unfortunately, we were obstructed and did not see how it left but it was gone. i was crushed when we looked up and it was gone! from the time i first noticed it moved and it couldn't be a star i was amazed. i knew it was something out of the ordinary and was so upset we did not get a telescope in time.  plese let me know if others reported this. i know for sure that many planes in the area that night flew by. those pilots had a great view.
content.summary: Very low star, not twinkling, moved slowly over a period of a few hours.

content.detailedDescription:
Wife and i were just exiting vehicle at stovepipe wells village (death valley, ca) at around 1735 hours on 11/17/2009.  my wife said what���s that pointing to the east at an large object stationary in the sky.  the object appeared to be oblong in shape and a bright rust-orange color. it looked like separate lights  (you could see dark between the lights making it look like segmented lighting) lined up in a row slightly curved to the east.  the object  brightened in intensity then faded quickly and was not visible (this sighting lasted 7-10 seconds).  we both watched the area and then within 15-20 seconds the same type of object started to appear again approx. 6 miles south-east (again over the armargosa range) of where this last object had disappeared from. it was not as bright and faded quickly and was not visible (this second sighting lasted maybe 4-6 seconds).    

the object appeared over the amargosa mountain range in death valley (the ridge line of the mountain was still quite visible).  i did a compass bearing after the sighting which was 29 degrees (declination set to 15 east) from stovepipe wells village. the line of sight runs from stovepipe to corkscrew peak  (amargosa mountain range) to north of beatty nevada. 

we watch the international space station and space shuttle quite often from here. neither of these were visible tonight in the death valley area (11/17/2009) in checking the human space flight site.   

the size of the object is what amazed us!   the space station and space shuttle (even when docked together ) are just large moving (non-blinking) lights in the sky.  and regular aircraft in the area are just small to moderate blinking lights in the sky.  in comparison and distance this object had to be at least a half mile in length!
content.summary: Rust-orange colored stationary oblong object with segmented lighting approx. one half mile in length

content.detailedDescription: At 6:15 p.M. i went to look out of my apartment window, i noticed a slow moving set of lights heading in a westerly direction, as my large picture window faces north west. the cloud cover was heavy and low, with a ceiling of about 500 ft. what i saw was a disc shaped craft that i gauged to be about 100 ft. across. it had pulsing blue, red,yellow and white lights spaced around its' perimeter. it was definetely not an airplane as i live only 4 kilometers from the airport, wich is to the east of me. i have seen 100s of planes of numerous types flying at all times during the day and night and their running lights and landing lights are nothing like what i saw on this disc. airplane lights flash, not throb. the disc was flying about 150 ft. below cloud cover, so it was comparatively low compared to the airplanes that fly in the area. it also was too large for any plane that could use our small airport. it was travelling westward, in the opposite direction of the airport and was over the feild across the road from where i live. it was about 1 to 1 1/2 kilometers away from me, which is why i was fairly sure of its' size. it continued on at the same slow speed and direction for about 2 minutes, it then rose up into the low cloud cover. it appeared to stop, hidden by the clouds, but the throbbing lights could be seen somewhat muted by the cloud cover. it stayed for about 3 minutes, then just dissappeared. the light did not move away, but just disappeared. i watched the area for another few minutes, but saw nothing else.
content.summary: Round disk with lights

content.detailedDescription: On 11/15/09 at approx 9:30pm i was in my bedroom watching tv and noticed a loud noise and saw some bright lights in my back yard. i initially thought it was a low flying airplane. i thought to myself, "it can't be an aitplane because they can't fly that low nor do they have that many lights on the bottom nor can they navigate turns so quickly. i went to my bedroom window and looked outside. i saw a long more like a flat oval craft flying low turning on it's side over my trees in my back yard. it had approx 12 lights in double rows around the bottom. there was a small red blinking light in the middle of the bottom. the object flew pretty quickly over my house. i ran to my other window facing the side/front of my house. i saw it turn quickly and flew over my neighbor's house.It then flew off quickly toward the north. i thought in my head,"oh no...Not again!!" as i had just seen one on 11/12/09. i got in my bed and closed my eyes.
content.summary: I saw an oval shaped craft with 12 bright lights fly low over my house

content.detailedDescription: Looked out window saw a silver bright flashing object moving over roof, toware ne, it went behind tree flashing to a count of seven times, it vanished, another small object came in with rec bottom, it vanished, and another silver flashing object came in. the time started at 6:33, and went on until 7:18. what a show.
content.summary: Saw an object silver flashing, another small one with red light on bottom, and another silver one.

content.detailedDescription:
I walked out side of my job and looking up and to the east i noticed what 
i believe to be a ramjet contrail.  as i was looking at the contrail another plane, not a comercial jet, flew very fast above the first trail.  i then ran inside and grabbed my cell phone and snapped 3 pictures.  i have seen these trails in the sky many times around this area.  the pictures were taken about 30 miles south of macdill afb in tampa which seems to be the area the trails come from.
content.summary: Ramjet contrail

content.detailedDescription:
At 1 am november 1, 2009 a lady called to tell me she saw a red orange object around bellaire rd.  last week another lady from berea called to tell me the same thing.  the object was seen on halloween around 9pm.

the second lady said it was a drone and was according to her son near a hopkins runway .  the teenager saw a rotor and a tail.  the woman concluded it was no a rc.  i am not sure about that one at all.  i asked her the size she said the light looked like a cm.  there was no noise. her son is into drones and was taking an enrichment type class at osu which included drones.  so, basically, these people are plugged into the subject.  the second lady also told me she saw the bellaire woman's posting on a ufo site and contacted her.

these locations are not too far apart from each other, bellaire and berea.

whatever these two women saw, and with the rotor and tail information and size, it could be an rc, neither woman would divulge who they were or their phone numbers or where they lived other than a general location.  so whatever, i feel reporting it as an obligation, but am not delving into this with no further ability to contact these people.

one woman said her husband was middle eastern and was a realtor.  the other said her husband works for nasa and would not be happy that she was talking with me.

this is completed as far as i'm concerned.
content.summary: Two phone calls regarding red orange object in berea and then in bellaire rd. area

content.detailedDescription: Witness while at work saw 7 small metallic balls in the ne sky reflecting sun light.  the objects danced around each other.  commercial aircraft in sight.
content.summary: 7 small metallic balls spinning around each other.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking home from work last night when i noticed two very bright orange lights(much to large and bright to be a star) behind the building that i live in. these lights were side-by-side at maybe a 15 degree angle to each other. the light on the right started to dim and turn black then a couple of seconds later would appear to the left of the other light..Then the one that was now on the right did exactly the same thing. it continued this pattern for maybe 30 seconds. i thought they were flares at first but they were not descending and the blinking on and off was too methodical. it was not twinkling. anyway i ran upstairs to tell my boyfriend to look out the back porch but then it was gone.. i kept looking for a minute and i saw some plane lights. but this was much to close to the mountain to be a commercial plane and there was no sound. it was moving pretty slowly for a plane and the lights were not consistent like a plane. it was very twinkly red and white lights but dim like it was very far away. it moved to the west for a ways then the lights went to a solid dim white light..Continuing on the same path then disappeared. i told my boyfriend about it while we were still on the porch..Just as i was explaining the plane thing we saw a very bright white light! (as big and bright as sirius looks sometimes) it flew right over our house crossing main st. very quickly and the light just dimmed out before it went out of sight. all of this happened within five minutes or so of when i first noticed it. i just found out that my friend that was coming back to town from lancaster had seen the same thing around 6:00 as well! she described seeing the orange lights blinking in the same fashion as well. if these were just flares or something i would love to know how a simple flare can change it's position after it dims out..
content.summary: Two orange lights slowly blinking on and off and a "fake plane"

content.detailedDescription:
Hello i run a website called www.Mabusincarnate.Com for over 7 years i have been discussing ufos and the paranormal. i have never really talked to mufon.
but someone told me i should turn in my report to you guys. so here i am. i have seen ufos for over 15 years. i believe for some odd reason i attract them and many witnesses agree. so i made my site above to find out information and gather data. i have interviewed william birnes from ufo hunters and many other folks there in our chat room. plus we have a paranormal magazine called continuum. i would love more info about mufon. i would also be interested in interviewing one of your guys sometime for the website. just wanted to say hi and turn this in thank you. jeffery pritchett: founder of mabus incarnate






new ufo sighting 621pm. florida, panhandle. with 2 witnesses. tonight i had a ufo sighting. four objects red and blinking oddly. they flew very close to each other. all 4 objects and then two flew away. four sphere like objects moving insanely close to each other. strangest sighting i have had since my first sightings many years ago. i need a video camera and do not know anything about them. what kind of video camera would pick up ufos in the sky? i friggin need one and the right one like really soon. contact me please if you know about video equipment or speak here. it must be able to pick up aerial phenomena. i have no doubt of what i saw with witnesses. just need to get it on film. i don't have much cash so just gathering data. i haven't had a sighting this odd in many moons..But have definitely seen similar things in my past.
content.summary: Ufo sighting 621pm. florida panhandle. with 2 witnesses.

content.detailedDescription:
All this started when a good friend of mine who lives in beaverton oregon filmed a slow moving ball like object in the sky one day. his video has been sent in and is being investigated. so i was watching other videos on youtube when i noticed something very odd. today was a somewhat nice day here in oregon so i decided to get my camera and just start filming the sky. after i downloaded the video to my computer and played it back i did not see anything, but when i slowed it down i saw the same teardrop like objects that are seen in other videos traveling from the sky to the earth, and from the earth to the sky.
the video i have attached was taken on my back porch facing south east it was around 2:30 pm.When i started filming i saw nothing in the sky at first then towards the end of the video a bird did fly by.
after i slowed down the video i first thought what i was seeing was just glitches of some sort, but when i paused and played the video i could see the teardrop like objects.
i am really amazed of what i cought on video. i am still excited about it. next spring and summer i plan on doing more filming of the skies.
content.summary: I was just curious to see what i would get

content.detailedDescription:
Approximately 1 am on the 14th after most of the viewers were sleeping, a device scanned the trailors at the amboy compound.  the sheriff awoke to the bright lights.  one employee of roy's cafe saw the lights as he was awake and tried to awaken the person in the next trailor by yelling at him.  the other employee did not wake up.

so there are two witnesses, but about 20 people in 5th wheels were also scanned but did not awaken.

one trailor was scanned for a lengthy time and rescanned a second time.

the other reporting centers are not updating any longer it seems.  so you guys get tagged.

1.  this is reported to me by my son who is the sleeping emplyee in the report.  i was here at home.

2.  it was the lights that got the attention of the awake employee and the sheriff who never experiences such light out there.

3.  no one really saw the object and were too fearful to even look. (can't blame them there!)

4.  beam of light scanned all trailors.

5. ?

6. lights turned off.  it was assumed that the vehicle (or light source) simply went upward.

i don't want to discuss this with anyone but members from your office.
content.summary: Object not seen.  lights scanning trailors in amboy the night there were visitors viewing leonids.

content.detailedDescription: When i was 13 my brother and i were walking up the road to go feed a neighbors cat up the hill from us, he was in the hospital, when i noticed a very bright what apeared to be a star a great distance east from us, but it was brighter then any other star in the sky so it caught my eye. as i stared at it for a minute i noticed it was moving ever so slightly, so i said to my brother hay do you see that bright star its moving we stoped and stared at it for a minute and he said bullshit so we kept walking but for some reason i kept looking back to it and noticed it was moving so i said to him no stop for a minute it is moving so we both stoped and started looking at it, i said to him it is moving isn't it, then it went from 12 oclock to about 9 oclock in under 2 seconds stoped went straight up for a long way stoped returned to its starting point and started heading to us from the distance this thing was from us i would say it went 150 miles in under 2 seconds 3 times and now it was heading our way i asked him what is that a helicopter he said i dont think a helicopter can go that fast so there we were standing and staring at this light trying to figure out what it was ruling out anything we knew of that could move like this thing just did. this is where the story goes off the deep end as it got closer we noticed not only the color but the size of this craft it was huge like 3 football fields big as it got streaght overhead it stoped and there we were staring up at the bigest thing i have ever seen in the sky it made no sound at all it stoped for about 20 seconds then continued over the mountain north west of us over virginia city we told our folks and big supprise they didnt beleive us i have only told a handfull of close friends over the years 30yrs to be exact and my brother and i talk about it from time to time i did talk to a guy about it ounce that told me he saw it to but he was drunk leaning against a poll in vc and didnt beleive what he had just seen funny it was about the same time i think he saw it go over him after we did or he could have just been jerking my chane. eather way i know i saw what i saw nothing will change that. and what we saw i couldnt tell you but what i do know is i havent seen anything like it sense. well somthing kind of like it but i didnt see the craft just a light dooing somthing sim and not for as long. last year.
content.summary: Big 300 yard saucer as a kid

content.detailedDescription:
1.Driving north on 183 towards early/brownwood. observed a bright single point of light yellow/orangish in color, approx twice as bright as jupiter in the night sky.

2. brightness intensity of the object.

3. unknown. these were absolutely not aircraft lights/landing lights, weather balloons or flares. the lights were intelligently controlled.

4. object was initially a single point of light for a few seconds then turned off. a few seconds passed and one by one three points of yellow/orangish lights formed a triangle with a fourth light coming on momentarily. as soon as the 4th light appeared, they all turned off quickly. points of light were stationary

6. lights abruptly went out.
content.summary: Observed lights defining triangle

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on transit rd. in clarence, ny heading north.  i reached up to adjust the rear heat in my truck using the overhead console.  as i looked up, an intense bright green fireball appeared in the eastern sky over clarence, ny (right passenger side of my car).  the fireball immediately shot left and then switched directions toward the right while moving downward at the same time (slightly diagonal direction until reaching a perfectly vertical motion) .  as the object moved downward toward the ground it accelerate at a speed that i have never seen before.  it continued to accelerate until disappearing as it neared the ground.  i would estimate the beginning altitude at about 2000 feet. it appeared so quickly and it was so intense that it frightened me.
content.summary: Green fireball.

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting in hot tub for about 15 minutes wife noticed a formation many miles away comming from the north about  30 seconds later i finally saw them comming straight towards us. about 18 too 20 glowing balls of light
in a v formation with many of them moving back and forth in a mechanical 
motion.
    as they got almost over our house they turned too the east in a slow turn and went behind our roof, my guess would be they were going at least 400 mph and 10,000 feet as compared too the jets that fly over.
content.summary: 15 too 18 glowing spheres in a v shape several moving and changing directions in the v formation.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my mother were driving up on three mile road, going to visist my brother. i was looking out the window toward the south east, and noticed a bright floresent light in the sky. there was flash, then the light ended up 3 to 4 miles from where its origanal position. then there was 3 more flashes, then 2 orange lights appeered, along with one bright light desening from the clouds. then they started to do manuvers that any aircraft that i seen can do. this went on for about 7 minutes. one of the light seemed to desend to a hill. and then there was one big flash, next thing they were gone. also on the next night november 17th, 2009. at 7:45pm. mst. my next door neighbor also reported the same lights above the same area from the previos night. same lights same manovers. i'm from the rocky boy's indian reservation. and i never seen that sort of manuvers from any air craft around this area. in greatfalls mt. we have the melstrom air force base. and i never seen or heard of there air craft doing them kind of manovers.
content.summary: A bright fluorescent orange light caught my eye south east of the rocky boy indian reservation
